blogs.title: blog no. 2
blogs.content: To me, this is the best answer, because React doesn't have anything built in. You either have to import fetch or superagent or jQuery or axios or something else that is not part of vanilla React in order to do anything other than what is posted above.

blogs.title: Test for DB
